swerve.translation[0].definitions[0].def: to make a sudden sideways movement while moving forwards, usually in order to avoid hitting something
swerve.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: The car swerved sharply to avoid the dog.
The bus swerved off the road.
swerve.translation[0].definitions[1].def: to change from an idea, course of action, purpose etc
swerve.translation[0].definitions[1].exa: He would never swerve from the truth.
